::Slayer::

Slayer laughs loudly and harshly as Spears pulls out a spear, obvioustly 
planning to attack him. The idea itself was humorous to him. A femm attacking 
him? He was sure the fight wouldn't last more than a nano-cycle. His shoulder 
blasters emerge, his hands closing around both his swords. Slayer narrows his 
eyes, ready for battle.

He nearly growls in disapointment as he hears his masters orders, his 
shoulder blasters sliding back in, and his hands leaving his swords. "I 
apologize, Master," he says to Prebon, snarling at Spears afterwards.

"Watch yourself, femm," he growls at her, pushing past her and walking to the 
suit.

He looks it over as he stops near it, not bothering to even glance back at 
Spears, his face breaking into an evil smile. It was excellent. Rocket 
launchers, infared goggles, a pair of swords... (I'm repeating what Minime 
posted about it, not making anything up)

Slayer picks up the suit and begins to put it on.
